main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Covington, Kentucky on July 7, 1967, involving multiple witnesses including Mrs. XXXXX and Mr. Covington.
interesting points: Witness described the object as elliptical in shape and bluish-green in color,It hovered between 300 to 500 feet for 2 to 3 minutes before disappearing,Mr. Covington initially mistook the object for a plane until he pulled over to watch it closely,One witness reported that the object had a bright light and made no sound,The case had insufficient data for evaluation due to the late report.
sighted object: An unidentified aerial object, elliptical and bluish-green
witness description: Mrs. XXXXX described the object as bluish-green and elliptical, Mr. Covington reported seeing a circular object with a reddish-orange hue.
